import React, {useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import Topbar from '../Topbar/Topbar' import './VacanciesView.css' import axios from "axios"; const moment = require('moment'); import Pagination from "../Pagination/Pagination"; import ModalVacations from "../Templates/ModalVacations/ModalVacations" function VacanciesView() { const [modalVacations, setModalVacations] = useState(false) const [deps, setDeps] = useState([]) const [vacation, setVacation] = useState([]) const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1) const [postsPerPage] = useState(10) const lastPostIndex = currentPage * postsPerPage const firstPostIndex = lastPostIndex - postsPerPage const currentlyPosts = vacation.slice(firstPostIndex, lastPostIndex) const paginate = pageNumber => setCurrentPage(pageNumber) const department = useRef() useEffect(() => { const VacationsFinde = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/api/departments/') setDeps(res.data) const getVacation = await axios.get('/api/Vacations/') setVacation(getVacation.data) } VacationsFinde() }, []) return ( <>
